tasks.label: Compile and Run
tasks.command: clear; if [[ '${fileExtname}' == '.cpp' || '${fileExtname}' == '.cxx' || '${fileExtname}' == '.cc' ]]; then g++ -o ${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}.out ${file} && ${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}.out; else gcc -o ${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}.out ${file} && ${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}.out; fi
tasks.detail: Automatically compiles and runs C/C++ files using the appropriate compiler.
